General.Name: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited generates and distributes electricity in Thailand. The company operates through Energy & Utilities, and Petrol and Gas Stations segments. It operates municipal solid waste fired, coal-fired, waste-to-energy, and waste-heat recovery power plants; and petrol and natural gas (NGV) service stations. The company sells its electricity to the electricity generating authority of Thailand. As of December 31, 2021, it operated 8 power plants with a total installed power generation capacity of 440 megawatt, as well as 8 petrol stations, 3 fuel and natural gas stations, and 1 gas station under the TPIPP brand. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. TPI Polene Power Public Company Limited operates as a subsidiary of TPI Polene Public Company Limited.
